title: Some boxes are missing in image result
body:
Hi Cartucho,

Your repo gives same mAP result than other repos ([this](https://github.com/rafaelpadilla/Object-Detection-Metrics) one) on my own dataset so I guess mAP computation is good. However when I take a look at result images with drawn boxes I found some inconsistencies.

Here is the GT file for im_641.jpg:
```
haricot 204 1113 434 1246
haricot 557 1119 687 1266
haricot 822 1099 993 1331
haricot 1051 1207 1193 1387
haricot 1784 1057 1951 1301
haricot 693 1210 846 1340
```

and the detection file:
```
haricot 0.972217 1057 1198 1182 1374
haricot 0.966902 576 1120 705 1275
haricot 0.966396 241 1124 454 1254
haricot 0.922331 852 1122 1002 1322
haricot 0.365273 710 1213 904 1319
```

GT has 6 boxes but output image only has 5 (blue box) but detected boxes seems good:
![im_641](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19164542/60712389-3132fc80-9f17-11e9-9f07-2ff3e797c299.jpg)

Any idea why this is occuring?

Thanks in advance.
